main.bio: My name is Sathwick. I love coding because with just a few lines of code I can turn my ideas into reality, which potentially can impact the world and shape the future.
main.bio2: I learned the basics of programming in Java during my Bachlors and I gained intrest in coading .I have done project related to car pedestrian detection system using haar cascade algoitham.
main.bio3: I'm currently studying at the Mahatma Gandhi Institute Of Technology ,Hyderabad for my Bachelor's in Electronics and Communications Engineering.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communications Engineering

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Involved in a project called Zonaldesk Workforce - Grievance Redressal. Objective was to create platform for workers to express their grievances / problems freely and frankly, without any fear of being victimized.
